meanings.definition: A removable or hinged cover for the top of a container.
meanings.sent1: The lids of the jars kept the food fresh.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the lid on the pot to let the soup simmer.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to balance on the lids of the pots and pans.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the lids of the city lights started to glow.
meanings.sent5: The lids of the treasure chest creaked open, revealing its contents.

meanings.definition: The upper or outer part of a container.
meanings.sent1: The lids of the boxes were securely taped shut.
meanings.sent2: He lifted the lid of the trunk to reveal the hidden items.
meanings.sent3: The lids of the buckets clanged loudly as they were stacked.
meanings.sent4: The lids of the clouds opened, letting the rain pour down.
meanings.sent5: The lids of the baskets were woven with intricate patterns.

meanings.definition: A cover or top for something.
meanings.sent1: The lids of the books protected the pages from dust.
meanings.sent2: She carefully placed the lid on the piano before playing.
meanings.sent3: The lids of the sandwiches were decorated with colorful toothpicks.
meanings.sent4: The lids of the mountains were covered in a blanket of snow.
meanings.sent5: The lids of the gift boxes were tied with elegant ribbons.
